Summary: multi-colored lights chased by military jets
divs: sighting detailsi was attending a friend's birthday party in san manuel, az, on november the 5th 2010. at around 8:20 or so, i know this because i text my mother as it was happening. anyways, at 8:20 my friend and i noticed a multi-colored flashing light above the mountains to the north of town. we called his dad to come out and check out the lights, because we wanted someone else to see it. as his dad came out, we heard the sounds of jets. then 3 jets appeared from the south\south east of town. the lights then began to move toward the west, and as the jets got closer to the lights, the lights just shot off to the west. we watched as the jets tried to catch it, but to be honest i don't think they are going to. just to clarify, i am 18 years old, and not a believer in this kind of thing. my dad is a believer, and i always give him grief about it. i won't any more. he reported the same thing a year ago, or so. so this is not the first time this has happened over san manuel.
trends: There has been one other sighting in San Manuel
There were no other sightings in San Manuel on or around November 5th 2010
